text:
May 3, 1961
NIGHT LETTER
CHARGE: National Association of Educational Broadcasters
1346 Connecticut Avenue
Washington 6, D. C.
Mr. Hartford N. Gunn, Jr.
Lowell Institute Cooperative Broadcasting Council
84 Massachusetts Avenue
Cambridge 39, Massachusetts
Harris still has no reply governors Rhode Island or Connecticut re
letter March 28 asking indication of interest in k±s using federal funds
for ETV if legislation enacted. Suggest check to see if response forth¬
coming what you might do to help. Governors response will have strong
political impact so important all reply soonest.
William G. Harley
National Association of Educational Broad¬
casters
